attributes.action: Have breaks in between every lesson
attributes.additional_details:
It would increase the amount of students who will relish the opportunity 
to go to lessons.
attributes.background: To give young students and children more divisions between lessons so that they can have a break when they have been studying and working hard.

rejection.details:
Decisions about school breaks are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with your local school. This could be via a school council, through a teacher, or the Head Teacher, or governors of the school.
